General.Name: SE-Education Public Company Limited
General.Description: SE-Education Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, operates bookstores in Thailand. The company operates through Retail Business, Other Distribution Channels, and School Business segments. It operates SE-ED book centers, network stores, and various university bookstores in Bangkok and other provinces, as well as the network and sales area in various forms. The company also publishes books; and distributes books to bookstores. In addition, it operates Plearnpattana School, which provides courses for students from pre-kindergarten to Matayom 6. The company was founded in 1974 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.
